app_name: Funny Food!ğŸ¥¦ABC games for toddlers and babies!ğŸ“š
app_detail:
Learning letters and sounds of ABC Alphabet phonics in educational kids games! We have put together the most effective methods to learn writing ABC & letters for kids!ğŸ­ğŸ¤—

ğŸˆWhile playing with funny food, your child will quickly and easily become familiar with all the letterst, learn how to write them and make the first steps in learning to read!

ğŸ¥¥Every task the alphabet sounds learning app gives your child is a fun and engrossing game! Entertaining stories, active gameplay and excellent usability will ease your child into the learning process. With the numerous hints and clear interface, children can play without help from adults.

ğŸ“With preschool games for kids 5 years free, getting ready for school is easy and fun!

To make learning letters more interesting, we created a magical world for each of our mini kids learning games free. In these magic worlds your child will experience delightful adventures which will encourage them to play again and again.ğŸ 

Our different worlds are:

ğŸ­Factory. Press buttons on the control panel and operate different machinery! Bake delicious letter shaped cookies for your funny friends. 

ğŸš—Gas station. Write a letter, and the magic gas station will be open for business!. Instead of filling up the airplaneâ€™s tank with jet fuel, fill it up with bubbles, fire, or even rainbows and send the plane into a magic flight. watch the plane take off on a magic adventure!

ğŸ¦Chameleon. Funny food is hiding in the grass and catching letters with its long sticky tongue. Help it catch the right letters. 

ğŸ•¶Superhero. Food-superhero rescues letters from mysterious inhabitants of the night city. The superhero needs your help! Find the right letter!

ğŸIsland. Participate in a race on the tropical island. Find the hidden letters. Fill up your car and finish the race first. 

â˜ƒï¸Snowball cannon. Letâ€™s have a snowball fight! Only the most accurate shooter can shoot a snow letter and hit the target. 

ğŸ­Caramel rope. Turn the gadget from side to side, swing the yummy letter on the caramel rope and feed the jolly character. 

Playing just a few minutes a day will help your child to acquire the needed knowledge and skills crucial for every preschooler such as: 

âœ… ABC learning letters toddler 
âœ… Learning words for kids
âœ… Learning how to write letters 
âœ… Learning a food name for each letter 
âœ… Developing fine motor skills 
âœ… Education for kids


Funny Food!ğŸ¥¦ABC games for toddlers and babies!ğŸ“š:

ğŸ“ Has 7 amusing ABC toddler games for 4 year olds
ğŸ“ Has over 50 funny characters & hilarious sound effects
ğŸ“ Two in one; learning letters for kids and how to write them
ğŸ“ Is a fascinating way to learn English ABC
ğŸ“ Helps develop fine motor skills
ğŸ“ Has a Jolly English alphabet for children 
ğŸ“ Has a parental control
ğŸ“ No educational games for children require WiFi or an internet connection
ğŸ“ No outside advertisement.

There is only a part of the content available in the free version of the application. To gain access to the full version, you will need to make a built-in purchase.

ğŸŒŸAbout MAGE:ğŸŒŸ
We develop educational apps for toddlers, interactive books and nursery rhymes for young children and toddlers .
Our smart games for kids for free are distinguished by high quality content with particular attention to design. The simple and user-friendly interfaces of our free baby games for girls and boys have been especially created for little ones. With our apps kids learn syllables, learn letters and sounds for kindergarten, abc alphabet phonics letters.
â˜Our ABC letter tracing games contain no third party advertising and comply with the standards of â€œDesigned For Familyâ€.
